metadata.description: The Publisher of the World's Greatest Cartoonists has pulled out the stops for this year's Free Comic Book Day, commissioning all-new, exclusive work from the following comics heavyweights: Matt Furie, Noah Van Sciver, Simon Hanselmann, Jason, Ed Piskor, Dash Shaw, Richard Sala, Emil Ferris, and others. Each artist has created a new piece exclusively for Free Comic Book Day that relates to their latest book, making World's Greatest a must-have for Fantagraphics fans.
metadata.name: FCBD World's Greatest Cartoonists
